## 4.13 

```{r, echo=FALSE}
ordered <- films[order(films$runtime, decreasing=T),]
firstTenMovies <- ordered[1:10,]
firstTenMovies <- firstTenMovies[, c("title", "runtime")]

library(ggplot2)

p <- ggplot(firstTenMovies, aes(x=title, y=runtime, fill=title)) +
  geom_bar(stat="identity")+theme_minimal()+theme(axis.text.x=element_blank(),
        axis.ticks.x=element_blank())

p + scale_fill_brewer(palette="Dark2")
```
